author: Matt Brown
comment: I like the simplicity. Wish it used the smaller notification style so they didn't cover up the time I'm trying to see. That's my only nitpick.

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Matt,
Thank you for your feedback. Could you please tell us more details about the issue or better if you can, send us a picture that illustrates the inconvenience?
Oajoo Team

author: Dennis Boyce
comment: Like the design but should have a 12 hour option.  Don't want to do math to determine it is 9pm at night.

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Dennis,
Thank you for your feedback. Your suggestion was already been taken into consideration for future updates.
Oajoo Team

author: Bryan Hoefer
comment: Nice clean watch face, but it lacks the option to display 12 hour time.

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Bryan,
Thank you for your feedback. Your suggestion will be taken into consideration for future updates.
Oajoo Team

author: Anton Art
comment: Really nice cool looking watch face! I like its minimalistic design.

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Anton,
Thank you for your feedback and support!
Oajoo Team

author: Ana Tang
comment: Installed this just this morning 8am, it's already 4:15pm and still waiting for it to appear on my watch. What happened?

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Ana,
Thank you for your feedback. After installing it from your phone Play Store you have to go to the Play Store on the watch, you will see the list with watch faces, then drag from up to down to see the settings, then press the Home icon, then the last option is "Apps on your phone". You will still have to install the watch face.
Oajoo Team
